name: Attack du Chateau
description:
As Caesar continues is line of conquest around Gaul, the stories of his battles echoes all the way to rome as songs, painting and games. In this great time of expansion a tournament is organised. The patricians will honor his victories by playing the now famous game of "Attack du chateau" 

The purpose of the game is to create the biggest empire. You will need to own roads and castles without forgetting to attack other players. 

Also available on our Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/blackpotion

*IMPORTANT* : This is an alpha game, if you want to help us you can send us some bugs you saw and how to reproduce them. 

We are working on :  

 - Adding some cool music and SFX

 - Improving the AI

 - Optimization

 - Better graphisms

 - Bugs fix
